price: 150. Mise ma waxaan abuurnay malaa'igta dheddig ahaan, iyaguna ay goob joog ka ahaayeen?
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqnā al-malāikata ināthan wahum shāhidūna
